com.intel.jndn.utils.client.impl

Class SimpleClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.jndn.utils.client.impl.SimpleClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvancedClient

    public class SimpleClient
extends Object
implements Client
    Provide a client to simplify information retrieval over the NDN network.
    Author:
    Andrew Brown, andrew.brown@intel.com

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleClient

        public SimpleClient(long sleepTime,
                    long interestLifetime)
        Build a simple client
        Parameters:
        sleepTime - for synchronous processing, the time to sleep the thread between Face.processEvents()
        interestLifetime - the Interest lifetime for default Interests; see getAsync(net.named_data.jndn.Face, net.named_data.jndn.Name)

      • SimpleClient

        public SimpleClient()
        Build a simple client using default parameters

    • Method Detail

      • getDefault

        public static SimpleClient getDefault()
        Singleton access for simpler client use
        Returns:
        a default client

      • getAsync

        public CompletableFuture<net.named_data.jndn.Data> getAsync(net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
                                                            net.named_data.jndn.Interest interest)
        Asynchronously request the Data for an Interest. This will send the Interest and return immediately; with this method, the user is responsible for calling Face.processEvents() in order for the CompletableFuture to complete.
        Specified by:
        getAsync in interface Client
        Parameters:
        face - the Face on which to make the request; call Face.processEvents() separately to complete the request
        interest - the Interest to send over the network
        Returns:
        a future Data packet

      • getAsync

        public CompletableFuture<net.named_data.jndn.Data> getAsync(net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
                                                            net.named_data.jndn.Name name)
        Convenience method for calling Client.getAsync(net.named_data.jndn.Face, net.named_data.jndn.Interest) with a default Interest packet.
        Specified by:
        getAsync in interface Client
        Parameters:
        face - the Face on which to make the request; call Face.processEvents() separately to complete the request
        name - the Name to wrap inside a default Interest
        Returns:
        a future Data packet

      • getSync

        public net.named_data.jndn.Data getSync(net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
                                        net.named_data.jndn.Interest interest)
                                 throws IOException
        Synchronously retrieve the Data for an Interest; this will block until complete (i.e. either the data is received or the interest times out).
        Specified by:
        getSync in interface Client
        Parameters:
        face - the Face on which to make the request; this method will call Face.processEvents() at a configurable interval until complete or timeout
        interest - the Interest to send over the network
        Returns:
        a Data packet
        Throws:
        IOException - if the request fails

      • getSync

        public net.named_data.jndn.Data getSync(net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
                                        net.named_data.jndn.Name name)
                                 throws IOException
        Convenience method for calling Client.getSync(net.named_data.jndn.Face, net.named_data.jndn.Interest) with a default Interest packet.
        Specified by:
        getSync in interface Client
        Parameters:
        face - the Face on which to make the request; call Face.processEvents() separately to complete the request
        name - the Name to wrap inside a default Interest
        Returns:
        a Data packet
        Throws:
        IOException - if the request fails

      • getDefaultInterest

        public net.named_data.jndn.Interest getDefaultInterest(net.named_data.jndn.Name name)
        Create a default interest for a given Name using the client's passed settings (see SimpleClient(long, long))
        Parameters:
        name - the Name of the data to retrieve
        Returns:
        a default interest for the given name
